text:
- Has, um, your
embassy met with either

of the political
campaigns, the Trump

campaign, or the
Clinton campaign
during the course of this?

SERGEY KISLYAK: Uh, what
do you call campaign?

I was invited, for example,
to both conventions.
I was the first--
I was Republican Convention.

But then, unexpectedly,
while being there,

I was called back to Moscow
for reason that has nothing
to do with the elections.
So I wasn't there.
But we had invitations to both.
- So have you met--

talking about Cleveland-- with
any of the Trump advisers,
or Mr. Trump himself?
SERGEY KISLYAK: No.

But we met those
people who came to see

all the ambassadors who were
sitting in a special lounge.

They're specifically reserved
for the diplomatic corps.

And I was among those who
were there, talking to members

of the Congress to a whole
lot of peoples who cared
to come to us and talk to us.
[music playing]
